thread.section_title: Centre for Small Business Financing Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Centre for Small Business Financing | grants-loans.org
thread.title: Beth
thread.title_full: Centre for Small Business Financing reviewed by Beth

author: Beth
title: Beth
text:
I spoke to a rep, he hung up on me mid sentence, at first I though it was a mistake but he never called back. I guess he figured out that he couldn't get any money from me. I just get the info I needed straight from the government website so I guess this company is irrelevant and just out to make money. You can also get the info you need from 1 800 O-Canada
.
